abstract.t: This document specifies the RSA-based blind signature scheme with appendix (RSA-BSSA). RSA blind signatures were first introduced by Chaum for untraceable payments [Chaum83]. It extends RSA-PSS encoding specified in [RFC8017] to enable blind signature support. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/chris-wood/draft-wood-cfrg-blind-signatures.
